upakramopasaṃhārāvabhyāso'pūrvatā phalam |
arthavādopapattī ca liṅgaṃ tātparyanirṇaye || iti |
tatra sadeva saumyedamagra āsīdityupakramaḥ | aitadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ
tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā tattvamasi śvetaketo ityupasaṃhāraḥ | tayorbrahma-
viṣayatvenaikyarūpyamekaliṅgam | asakṛttattvamasītyuktirabhyāsaḥ |
mānāntarāgamyatvamapūrvatvam | ekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ phalam |
sṛṣṭisthitipralayapraveśaniyamanāni pañcārthavādāḥ | mṛdādidṛṣṭāntā
upapattayaḥ | tasmādetairliṅgairvedāntānāṃ nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvabra-
hmātmaparatvaṃ niścetavyam | taditthamaupaniṣadasyātmatattvasyāhamanubha-
ve'navabhāsamānatvāttasyānubhavasyādhyastātmaviṣayatvaṃ siddham |

kaṇabhakṣākṣacaraṇādikakṣīkṛtasyātmano bhānābhāvādahamanubhavasyā-
dhyastātmaviṣayatvameṣitavyam | na tāvadahamanubhavaḥ sarvagatatvamātmano-
vagamayitumīṣṭe | ahamihāsmi sadane jānāna iti prādeśikatvagraha-
ṇāt | na cedaṃ dehasya prādeśikatvaṃ pratibhāsata iti veditavyam |
ahamityullekhāyogāt | nanu yathā rājñaḥ sarvaprayojanavidhātari bhṛtye
mamātmā bhadrasena ityupacārastadvadātmavacanasyāhaṃśabdasya deha upacāra
iti cet — maivaṃ vocaḥ | upacaritātmabhāvasya dehādeḥ svasamānākṛ-
tiśilāputrakādivajjñātṛtvāyogāt | na ca jñātṛtvamapyupacaritam |
prayoktuḥ svapratipattiprakāśake prayoge pratipattṛtvopacārānupapatteḥ |
atha dehadharmaḥ prādeśikatvamātmanyupacaryeta tadā dehātmanorbhedena
bhavitavyam | prasiddhabhede māṇavake siṃhaśabdavatsāṃpratikagauṇatve
tirohitabhedena sārṣapādau rase tailaśabdavannirūḍhagauṇatve vā gauṇa-
mukhyayorbhedādhyavasāyasya niyatatvāt | atha mama śarīramiti bheda-
bhānasaṃbhavādgauṇatvaṃ manyethāstadayuktam | ahaṃśabdārthasya dehādibhyo
niṣkṛṣyāsādhāraṇadharmavattvena pratibhāsamānatvābhāvāt | aparathā
lokāyatikamataṃ nodayamāsādayet | mama śarīramityuktistu rāhoḥ
śira itivadaupacārikī | mama śarīramiti bruvāṇenāpi kastvamiti
pṛṣṭena vakṣasthalanyastahastena śṛṅgagrāhikayāyamahamiti prativacanasya
dīyamānatvena dehātmapratyayasya sakalānubhavasiddhatvāt | taduktam —

dehātmapratyayo yadvatpramāṇatvena kalpitaḥ |
laukikaṃ tadvadevedaṃ pramāṇaṃ tvātmaniścayāt || iti |
tathā ca vyāpakasya bhedabhānasya nivṛttervyāpyasya gauṇatvasya nivṛtti-
riti niravadyam |

nanvabhijñayā bhedasiddhirmā saṃbhūnnāma | pratyabhijñayā tu sohami-
tyevaṃrūpayā tatsiddhiḥ saṃbhaviṣyatīti cenna | vikalpāsahatvāt |
kimiyaṃ pratyabhijñā pāmarāṇāṃ syātparīkṣakāṇāṃ vā | nādyaḥ | dehavya-
tiriktātmaikyamavagāhamānāyāḥ pratyabhijñāyā anudayāt | pratyuta
śyāmasya lauhityavatkāraṇaviśeṣādalpasyāpi mahāparimāṇatvamavi-
ruddhamanubhavatāṃ taddeha eva tasyāḥ saṃbhavācca | na dvitīyaḥ | vyavahā-
rasamaye pāmarasāmyānatirekāt | aparokṣabhramasya parokṣajñānavinā-
śyatvānupapatteśca | yaduktaṃ bhagavatā bhāṣyakāreṇa — paśvādibhiścāvi-
śeṣāt (bra. sū. 1 | 1 | 1 bhā.) iti | bhāmatīkārairapyuktaṃ śāstraci-
ntakāḥ khalvevaṃ vicārayanti na pratipattāra iti | tathā cātmagoca-
rasyādhyāsātmarūpatvaṃ sustham |

na cārhatamatānusāreṇāhaṃpratyayaprāmāṇyāyātmano dehaparimāṇa-
tvamaṅgīkaraṇīyamiti sāṃpratam | madhyamaparimāṇasya sāvayavatvena
dehādivadanityatve kṛtahānākṛtābhyāgamaprasaṅgāt | athaitaddoṣapari-
jihīrṣayāvayavasamudāya ātmetyabhyupagamyeta tadā vaktavyam | kiṃ
pratyekamavayavānāṃ caitanyaṃ saṃghātasya vā | nādyaḥ | bahūnāṃ cetanānā-
mahamahamikayā pradhānabhāvamanubhavatāmaikamatyābhāvena samasamayaṃ viru-
ddhadikkriyatayāśa rīrasyāpi viśaraṇaniṣkriyatvayoranyatarāpātāt |
dvitīyepi saṃghātāpattiḥ kiṃ śarīropādhikī svābhāvikī yādṛ-
cchikī vā | nādyaḥ | ekasminnavayave chinne cidātmanopyavayava-
śchinna ityacetanatvāpātāt | na dvitīyaḥ | anekeṣāmavayavānāma-
nyonyasāhityaniyamādarśanāt | na tṛtīyaḥ | saṃśleṣavadviśleṣasyāpi
yādṛcchikatvena sukhena vasatāmakasmādacetanatvaprasaṅgāt |

na cāṇuparimāṇatvamātmanaḥ śaṅkanīyam | sthūlohaṃ dīrghohamiti
pratyayānupapatteḥ |

na ca vijñānātmabhāṣiṇāṃ naiṣa doṣaḥ | viśuddhasāvayavatvābhāvā-
diti gaṇanīyam | yaḥ suṣuptaḥ sohaṃ jāgarmīti sthiragocarasyāhamu-
llekhasya kṣaṇabhāṅgivijñānagocaratve atasmiṃstadbuddhirūpamithyādhyāsasya
tadavasthānāt | tadanena kṛśohaṃ kṛṣṇohamityādīnāṃ prakhyānānāṃ buddhyā
sarūpatākhyānenaupacārikatvaṃ pratyākhyātam | tadvyāpakabhedabhānāsaṃbha-
vasya prāgeva prapañcitatvāt | tathā ca prayogaḥ — vimataṃ śāstraṃ viṣaya-
prayojanasahitamāvidyakabandhanivartakatvātsuptotthitabodhavat | yathā
svapnāvasthāyāṃ māyāparikalpitayoṣādikṛtabandhanivartakasya supto-
tthitabodhasya mandiramadhye sukhena śayyāyāmavatiṣṭhamāno deho viṣayaḥ |
tasya suptabodhenāniścayāt | svapnamāyāvijṛmbhitānarthanivṛttiḥ prayo-
janam | evaṃ mananādijanyaparokṣajñānadvāreṇādhyāsikakartṛtvabhoktṛtvā-
dyanarthaniṣedhakasya śāstrasya saccidānandaikarasaṃ pratyagātmabhūtaṃ brahma
viṣayaḥ | tasyāhamanubhavenāniścayāt | adhyāsanivṛttiḥ prayojanam |
tathā cāphalatvāditi heturasiddha iti siddham | taduktam —

śrutigamyātmatattvaṃ tu nāhaṃbuddhyāvagamyate |
api khe kāmato mohā nātmanyastaviparyaye || iti |
itoyamasaṃdigdhatvāditi heturapyasiddha iti siddham |

yadyapi sarvaḥ prāṇī pratyagātmāstitvaṃ pratyetyahamasmīti | na hi
kaścidapi nāhamasmīti vipratipadyate | pratyagātmaiva brahma | tattvamasi
(chā. 6 | 8 | 7) iti sāmānādhikaraṇyāt | tasmādātmatattvamasaṃdigdhaṃ
siddham | tathāpi dharmaṃ prati vipratipannā bahuvidhā iti nyāyena
viśeṣapratipattirupapadyata eva | tathā hi | caitanyaviśiṣṭaṃ dehamātmeti
lokāyatā manyante | indriyāṇyātmetyanye | antaḥkaraṇamātmetyapare |
kṣaṇabhaṅguraṃ saṃtanyamānaṃ vijñānamātmeti bauddhā budhyante | dehaparimāṇa
ātmeti jainā jināḥ pratijānate | kartṛtvādiviśiṣṭaḥ parameśva-
rādbhinno jīvātmeti naiyāyikādayo varṇayanti | dravyabodhasvabhāva-
mātmetyācāryāḥ paricakṣate | bhoktaiva kevalaṃ na karteti sāṃkhyāḥ
saṃgirante | cidrūpaḥ kartṛtvādirahitaḥ parasmādabhinnaḥ pratyagātme —
tyaupaniṣadā bhāṣante | evaṃ prasiddhe dharmiṇi viśeṣato vipratipattau
tadviśeṣasaṃśayo yujyate | tathā ca saṃdehasaṃbhavājjijñāsyatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ
siddham | taditthaṃ brahmaṇo vicāryatvasaṃbhavena tadvicārātmakaṃ brahmamī-
māṃsāśāstramārambhaṇīyamiti yuktam | janmādyasya yataḥ (bra. sū. 1 | 1 | 2)
ityādisarvasya śāstrasyaitadvicārāpekṣatvācchāstraprathamādhyāyasaṃgatami-
damadhikaraṇam |

nanvitthaṃbhūte brahmaṇi kiṃ pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣamanumānamāgamo vā | na ka-
dācittatra pratyakṣaṃ kramate | atīndriyatvāt | nāpyanumānam | vyāptasya
liṅgasyābhāvāt | nāpyāgamaḥ | yato vāco nivartante (tai. 2 | 4 | 1)
iti śrutyaivāgamagamyatvaniṣedhāt | upamānādikamaśakyaśaṅkam |
niyataviṣayatvāt | tasmādbrahmaṇi pramāṇaṃ na saṃbhavatīti cet — maivaṃ
vocaḥ | pratyakṣādyasaṃbhavepyāgamasya sattvāt | yato vāco nivartante
iti vāggocaratvaniṣedhātkathametaditi cet — śrutireva niṣedhati
vedāntavedyatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ śrutireva vidhatte | na hi vedapratipāditerthenu-
papanne vaidikānāṃ buddhiḥ khidyate | api tu tadupapādanamārgameva
vicārayati | tasmādubhayamapi pratipādanīyam | viṣayatvaniṣedhakā-
ni vākyāni vākyajanyavṛttivyaktasphuraṇalakṣaṇaphalāsaṃbhavavivakṣayā
pravṛttāni | viṣayatvabodhakāni tu vṛttijanyāvaraṇabhaṅgalakṣaṇaphala-
saṃbhavavivakṣayā | taduktaṃ bhagavadbhiḥ —

anādheyaphalatvena śruterbrahma na gocaraḥ |
prameyaṃ pramitau tu syādātmākārasamarpaṇāt || iti |

na prakāśyaṃ pramāṇena prakāśo brahmaṇaḥ svayam |
tajjanyāvṛtibhaṅgatvātprameyamiti gīyate || iti ca |

nanu syādeṣa manoratho yadi siddherthe vedasya prāmāṇyaṃ sidhyet |
saṃgatigrahaṇāyattatvātprāmāṇyaniścayasya | saṃgatigrahaṇasya ca vṛddha-
vyavahārāyattatvāt | vṛddhavyavahārasya ca loke kāryaikaniyatatvāt |
na hyasti saṃbhavaḥ śabdānāṃ kāryerthe saṃgatigrahaḥ siddhārthābhidhāya-
katvaṃ tatra vā prāmāṇyamiti | na hi turaṅgatve gṛhītasaṃgatikaṃ tura-
ṅgapadaṃ gotvamācaṣṭe tatra vā prāmāṇyaṃ bhajate | tasmātkāryagṛhītasaṃ-
gatikānāṃ śabdānāṃ kārya eva prāmāṇyam | nanu mukhavikāsādili-
ṅgāddharṣahetuṃ prasiddhārthamanumāya yatra śabdasya saṃgatigraho yathā putraste
jāta ityādiṣu tatrāvaśyaṃ kāryamantareṇaiva śabdasya siddherthe prāmāṇya-
māśrīyata iti cenna | putrajanmavadeva priyāsukhaprasavāderanekasya
harṣahetorupasthīyamānatvena pariśeṣāvadhāraṇānupapatteḥ | putraste jāta
ityādiṣu siddhārthapareṣu prayogeṣu dvāraṃ dvāramityādivatkāryādhyāhā-
reṇa prayogopapatteśca | śāstratvaprasiddhyā ca na vedāntānāṃ siddhārtha-
paratvam | pravṛttinivṛttiparāṇāmeva vākyānāṃ śāstratvaprasiddheḥ |
taduktaṃ bhaṭṭācāryaiḥ —

pravṛttirvā nivṛttirvā nityena kṛtakena vā |
puṃsāṃ yenopadiśyeta tacchāstramabhidhīyate || iti |
na caiteṣāṃ svarūpaparatve prayojanamasti | śrutavedāntārthasyāpi puṃsaḥ
sāṃsārikadharmāṇāmanivṛtteḥ | tasmādvedāntānāmapyātmā jñātavya
iti samāmnātena vidhinaikavākyatāmāśritya kāryaparataivāśrayaṇī-
yeti siddham | tataśca kevalasiddharūpe brahmaṇi vedāntānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ
na sidhyatīti cet |

atra pratividhīyate — na tāvatsiddhe vyutpattyasiddhiḥ | prāgunnītayā
nītyā putraste jāta iti vākyātsiddhaparādapi vyutpattisiddheḥ | na
ca pariśeṣāvadhāraṇānupapattiḥ | priyāsukhaprasavāderapi saṃbhavāditi
bhaṇitavyam | putrapadāṅkitapaṭapradarśanavatpriyāsukhaprasavādisūcakā-
bhāvāt | putrajanbhaiva tatsūcakamiti cet — prathamapratītaputrajanmapari-
tyāge kāraṇābhāvāt | putrajananasyaivādhikānandahetutvācca |

putrotpattivipattibhyāṃ nāparaṃ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ |
iti vidyamānatvāt | tathā cācakathaccitsukhācāryaḥ —

dṛṣṭacaitrasutotpattestatpadāṅkitavāsasā |
vārtāhāreṇa yātasya pariśeṣaviniściteḥ || (citsu. pṛ. 88) iti |
yaduktaṃ siddhārthapareṣu kāryādhyāhāra iti tadayuktam | mukhyārthaviṣa-
yatayā siddhepi prayogasiddhāvadhyāhārānupapatteḥ | yaduktaṃ śāstratva-
prasiddhyā ca na svarūpaparatvamiti tadapyayuktam | hitaśāsanādapi
śāstratvopapatteḥ | na ca prayojanābhāvaḥ | śrutamatavedāntajanyādvi-
tīyātmavijñānābhyāsena vidyodaye saṃsāranidānāvidyānivṛttyupala-
kṣitabrahmātmatālakṣaṇaparamapuruṣārthasiddheḥ | na cātra vidhiḥ saṃbhavati |
vikalpāsahatvāt | tathā hi — kiṃ śābdajñānaṃ vidheyaṃ kiṃ vā bhāva-
nātmakamāhosvitsākṣātkārarūpam | nādyaḥ | viditapadārthasaṃgati-
kasyādhītaśabdanyāyatattvasyāntareṇāpi vidhiṃ śabdādevopapatteḥ | nāpi
dvitīyaḥ | bhāvanāyā jñānaprakarṣahetubhāvasyānvayavyatirekasiddhatayā
prāptatvenāvidheyatvāt | aprāptaprāpakasyaiva vidhitvāṅgīkārāt |
tṛtīye sākṣātkāraḥ kiṃ brahmasvarūpaḥ kiṃ vāntaḥkaraṇapariṇāmabhedaḥ |
nādyaḥ | tasya nityatvenāvidheyatvāt | nāpi dvitīyaḥ | ānandasākṣā-
tkārarūpatayā phalatvenāvidheyatvāt | tasmājjñātavya ityādīnāma-
vidhāyakatvādarhe kṛtyatṛcaśca (pāṇi. sū. 3 | 3 | 169) iti kṛtyapratya-
yānāmarhārthe vidhānādarhārthataiva vyākhyeyā | tathā ca sarveṣāṃ vedānta-
vākyānāmupakramopasaṃhārādiṣaḍvidhatātparyopetatvānnityaśuddhabuddhamu-
ktasvabhāvabrahmātmaparatvamāstheyam |

niṣpradeśe paramāṇau pradeśavṛttitvenābhimatasya saṃyogasya durupapā-
danatayā tannibandhanasya dvyaṇukasyāsiddhau dvyaṇukādikrameṇārambhavā-
dāsaṃbhavādacetanāyāḥ prakṛtermahadādirūpeṇa pariṇāmavādāsaṃbhavācca
khyātibādhānyathānupapattyānirvacanīyaḥ prapañcaścidvivarta iti siddham |
svarūpāparityāgena rūpāntarāpattirvivarta iti satyamithyākhyāva-
bhāsa iti | avabhāsodhyāsa iti paryāyaḥ | sa cādhyāso dvividhaḥ —
arthādhyāso jñānādhyāsaśceti | taduktam —

pramāṇadoṣasaṃskārajanmānyasya parātmatā |
taddhīścādhyāsa iti hi dvayamiṣṭaṃ manīṣibhiḥ || iti |

punarapi dvividhodhyāsaḥ | nirupādhikasopādhikabhedāt | tadapyu-
ktam —

upādhisaṃnidhiprāptakṣobhāvidyāvijṛmbhitam |
upādhyapagamāpohyamāhuḥ sopādhikaṃ bhramam || iti |
tatra svarūpeṇa kalpitāhamādyadhyāso nirupādhikaḥ | tadapyuktam —

nīlimeva viyatyeṣā bhrāntyā brahmaṇi saṃsṛtiḥ |
ghaṭavyomeva bhoktāyaṃ bhrānto bhedena na svataḥ || iti |
ata eva bhāṣyakāraḥ śuktikā rajatavadavabhāsata ekaścandraḥ sadvi-
tīyavaditi nidarśanadvayamudājahāra | śiṣṭaṃ śāstra eva spaṣṭamiti
vistarabhiyoparamyate | evaṃ ca dṛgdṛśyau dvāveva padārthāviti vedā-
ntināṃ siddhānta iti sarvamavadātam |

atra prabhākaraḥ — śuktikā rajatavadavabhāsata iti dṛṣṭānto neṣṭaḥ |
rajatapratyayasya śuktikālambanatvānupapatteḥ | tathā hi — idaṃ rajatamiti
pratītau śukterālambanatvaṃ purodeśasattāmātreṇāvalambyate kāraṇatvena
bhāsamānatvena vā | nādyaḥ | purovartināṃ loṣṭādīnāmapyālambanatva-
prasaṅgāt | atha kaladhautabodhakaraṇasaṃskārodbodhakāraṇatvena taddvārā
rajatajñānakāraṇatvādālambanatvaṃ manyase | tadapi na saṃgacchate |
cakṣurādīnāmapi kāraṇatvena viṣayatvāpātāt | atha bhāsamānatayā
viṣayatvamiṣyate tadapyaśliṣṭam | rajatanirbhāsasya śuktikālambana-
tvānupapatteḥ | yasminvijñāne yadavabhāsate tattadālambanam | atra ca
kaladhautānubhavaḥ śuktikālambanatvakalpanāyāṃ virudhyate | tathā
cācakathannyāyavīthyāṃ śālikanāthaḥ —

lg.l: atra brūmo ya evārtho yasyāṃ saṃvidi bhāsate |
tadeva tena vedyaṃ syānna tu śuktiravedanāt ||

div.p:
tenānyasyānyathā bhāsaḥ pratītyaiva parāhataḥ |
anyasminbhāsamāne hi na paraṃ bhāsate yataḥ || (praka. pa. 4 | 23 — 25) iti |

kiṃ ca mithyājñānotpattau sāmagrī na samasti | kiṃ kevalānīndri-
yādīni kāraṇāni doṣadūṣitāni vā | nādyaḥ | teṣāṃ samīcīnajñā-
najananasāmarthyopalambhāt | anyathā samīcīnaṃ rajatajñānaṃ na kadā-
cidudayamāsādayet | na dvitīyaḥ | doṣāṇāmautsargikakāryaprasavaśa-
ktipratibandhamātraprabhāvatvāt | na hi duṣṭaṃ kuṭajabījaṃ vaṭāṅkuraṃ jana-
yitumīṣṭe | na vā tailakaluṣitaṃ śālibījamaśālyaṅkurajananāyālam |
kiṃ tu svakāryaṃ na karoti | nanu dāvadahanadagdhasya vetrabījasya kada-
līkāṇḍajanakatvaṃ dṛṣṭamiti cet — tanna sthāne | dagdhasyāvetrabījatvena
doṣāṇāṃ viparītakāryakāritvaṃ pratyanudāharaṇāt | na ca bhasmakadoṣa-
dūṣitasya kaukṣeyakasyāśuśukṣaṇerbahvannapacanasāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭamityeṣṭavyam |
aśitapītādyāhārapariṇatau jāṭharasya jātavedasaḥ śaktatvāt |
taduktam —

bhasmakādiṣu kāryasya vighātādeva doṣatā |
agnerhi rasaniṣpattiḥ kāryaṃ jaṭharavartinaḥ || (praka. pa. 4 | 73 — 74) iti |

api cāsatyapyarthe jñānaprādurbhāvābhyupagame samīcīnasthalepi
jñānānāṃ svagocaravyabhicāraśaṅkāṅkurasaṃbhavena niraṅkuśo vyavahāro
lupyate | tadāha —

yadi cārthaṃ parityajya kācidbuddhiḥ prakāśate |
vyamicāravati svārthe kathaṃ viśvāsakāraṇam || (praka. pa. 4 | 66) iti |

nanu rajatagocaraikaviśiṣṭajñānānaṅgīkāre viśiṣṭavyavahāro na
sidhyet | atastatsiddhayepi viparyayoṅgīkārya iti cenna | idaṃ raja-
tamiti grahaṇasmaraṇābhidhasya bodhadvayasya vyavahārakāraṇatvāṅgīkā-
rāt | yadyevamidaṃ śuktikāśakalaṃ tadrajatamityatopi viśiṣṭavyavahāraḥ
syāditi | tanna | tatredamiti purovartidravyamātragrahaṇasya doṣadūṣita-
cakṣurjanyatvenānākalitaśuktitvādiviśeṣitasya sāmānyamātragrahaṇa-
rūpatvādrajatamiti jñānasyāsaṃnihitaviṣayasya saṃprayogaliṅgādyaprasūta-
tayā sadṛśāvabodhitasaṃskāramātraprabhavatvena pariśeṣaprāptasmṛtibhā-
vasya doṣahetukatayā gṛhītatattāṃśapramoṣādgrahaṇamātratvopapatteḥ | tada-
pyuktam —

rajataṃ viṣayīkṛtya naiva śuktervivecitam |
smṛtyāto rajatābhāsa upapanno bhaviṣyati || (praka. pa. 4 | 26 — 29)
pariśeṣātsmṛtiriti niścayo jāyate punaḥ | (praka. pa. 4 | 31 — 32) iti |

nanu kimidamekaikaṃ vyavahārakāraṇamuta saṃbhūya | na prathamaḥ | deśa-
bhedena pravṛttiprasaṅgāt | na caramaḥ | prayatnāyaugapadyājjñānāyaugapa-
dyāt (vai. sū. 3 | 2 | 3) ityādinā jñānayaugapadyaniṣedhāt | ato
jñānadvayaṃ heturityayuktaṃ vaca iti cet — maivaṃ vocaḥ | avinaśyatoḥ
sahāvasthānaniṣedhepi vinaśyadavinaśyatoḥ sahāvasthānasyāniṣiddha-
tvena nirantarotpannayostadupapatteḥ | nanu rajatajñānādrajatārthī rajate
pravartatāṃ nāma | paurastye vastuni kathaṃ pravṛttiḥ syāditi cenna |
svarūpato viṣayataścāgṛhītabhedayorgrahaṇasmaraṇayoḥ saṃnihitarajatago-
carajñānasārūpyeṇa vastutaḥ parasparaṃ vibhinnayorapyabhedocitasāmā-
nādhikaraṇyavyapadeśahetutvopapatteḥ | grahaṇasmaraṇayoḥ saṃnihitarajata-
jñānasārūpyaṃ katham | yathā caitattathā niśamyatām | saṃnihitarajata-
gocaraṃ hi vijñānamidamaṃśarajatāṃśayorasaṃsargaṃ nāvagāhate | tayoḥ
saṃsṛṣṭatvenāsaṃsargasyaivābhāvāt | nāpi svagataṃ bhedam | ekajñāna-
tvāt | evaṃ grahaṇasmaraṇe api doṣavaśādvidyamānamapīdamaṃśarajatāṃśa-
yorasaṃsargaṃ bhedaṃ nāvagāhata iti | bhedāgrahaṇameva sārūpyam | taduktaṃ
gurumatānusāribhiḥ —

lg.l: tato bhinne abuddhvā ca grahaṇasmaraṇe ime |

div.p:
aparokṣāvabhāsena samānārthagraheṇa ca |
availakṣaṇyasaṃvittiriti tāvatsamarthitā ||
vyavahāropi tattulyastata eva pravartate | (praka. pa. 4 | 33 — 37)
evamagṛhītavivekamāpannasaṃnihitarūpyajñānasārūpyaṃ grahaṇasmaraṇadvaya-
mayathāvyavahāraheturiti siddham | yadyevamayathāvyavahāro grahaṇasmara-
ṇajanyastarhi pītaḥ śaṅkha ityādau sa na siddhastatra tayorabhāvāditi
cenna | agṛhītavivekayoḥ prāptasamīcīnasaṃsargajñānasārūpyatve graha-
ṇayoreva vyavahārasaṃpādakatvopapatteḥ | nayanaraśmivartinaḥ pittadravyasya
pītimā doṣavaśāddravyarahito gṛhyate | śaṅkhopyakalitaśuklaguṇaḥ svarū-
pato gṛhyate | tadanayorguṇaguṇinoḥ saṃsargayogyayorasaṃsargāgrahasārūpyā-
tpītatapanīyapiṇḍapratyayāvailakṣaṇyādvyavahāra upapadyate | yathoktam —

lg.l: guṇe dravyavyapekṣe ca dravye ca guṇakāṅkṣiṇi |

div.p:
satyapītāvabhāsena same bhāte matī ime |
vyavahāropi tattulya evamatrāpi yujyate || (praka. pa. 4 | 48 — 51) iti |

nanvidaṃ rajatamiti bhrāntijñānānabhyupagame rajataprasakterasattvā-
nnedaṃ rajatamiti niṣedhaḥ kathaṃ kaladhautābhāvaṃ bodhayatīti cet — naiṣa
doṣaḥ | bhedāgrahaprasañjitasya śuktau rajatavyavahārasya niṣedhasvīkāreṇa
kalpanālāghavasadbhāvāt | taduktaṃ pañcikāprakaraṇe —

bādhakapratyayasyāpi bādhakatvamato matam |
prasajyamānarajatadhyavahāranivāraṇāt || (praka. pa. 4 | 38 — 39) iti |
tadanena prācīnayorjñānayoḥ satyatve kathaṃ bhramatvaprasiddhiriti śaṅkā
parākṛtā | ayathāvyavahārapravartakatvena tadupapatteḥ |

kiṃ ca nedaṃ rajatamiti bādhakāvabodho nābhāvamavagāhate |
bhāvavyatirekeṇābhāvasya durgrahaṇatvāt | yadyevamaṅga nāstīti pratya-
yasya kimālambanam | aparathā māhābhānikapakṣānupraveśa iti cet —
maivaṃ bhāṣiṣṭhāḥ | abhāvasya dharmipratiyoginirūpaṇādhīnanirūpyatve-
nāvaśyābhyupagamanīye dṛśye pratiyoginyadṛśye vā smaryamāṇedhika-
raṇamātrabuddhereva nāstīti vyavahāropapattāvatiriktābhāvakalpanāyāṃ
pramāṇābhāvāt | taduktamamṛtakalāyām —

tatra tanmātradhīryeyaṃ smṛte ca pratiyogini |
nāstitvaṃ saiva bhūbhāge ghaṭādipratiyoginaḥ || (praka. pa. 6 | 37 — 39) iti |
ata eva ca prābhākaramatānusāribhiḥ pramāṇapārāyaṇe pratyakṣā-
dīni pañcaiva pramāṇāni prapañcitāni | nanvevamabhāvasyābhāve nakā-
rasya vaiyarthyamāpadyeta | anuśāsanavirodhaścāpatediti cet — tadetadvā-
rtam | ekonapañcāśadvarṇānāṃ madhye kasyāpi varṇasyābhāvārthatvādarśanena
varṇasya sato nakārasya tadarthatvānupapatteḥ | na caivamanuśāsanavi-
rodhaḥ | tadanyatadabhāvatadviruddheṣvartheṣvanuśāsanasyaivamarthaḥ syāt |
tathā hi — cetanānāṃ madhye kaścana kasyacicchatruḥ kaścana kasyaci-
nmitraṃ kaścana kasyacidudāsīnastathaivācetanānāmapi | tadanyapadena
tadudāsīno nakārārthaḥ | viruddhapadena śatrurnakārārthaḥ | tadabhāvapadena
mitraṃ nakārārthaḥ | tathā cābrāhmaṇapada evaitattrayaṃ pratīyate śūdra ityu-
dāsīno yavana iti śatruḥ kṣatriya iti mitram | evaṃ sarvatra nañprayoga-
sthale draṣṭavyamiti na kaścidabhāvo bhāvavyatiriktaḥ saṃbhavati | tasmā-
duktayā rītyā bhramabādhaprasiddhyā vivādādhyāsitāḥ pratyayā yathārthāḥ
pratyayatvāddaṇḍīti pratyayavaditi siddham |

tadapare na kṣamante | iha khalu nikhilaprekṣāvānsamīhitatatsādha-
nayoranyatarapravedane pravartate | na ca rajatamarthayamānasya śuktikāśa-
kalajñānaṃ tadrūpamanubhāvayituṃ prabhavati | śuktikāśakalasya samīhita-
tatsādhanayoranyatarabhāvābhāvāt | nāpi rajatasmaraṇaṃ purovartini pravṛ-
ttikāraṇam | tasyānubhavapāratantryatayānubhavadeśa eva pravartakatvāt |
nāpi bhedāgraho vyavahārakāraṇam | grahaṇanibandhanatvāccetanavyavahā-
rasya | nanu na vayamekaikasya kāraṇatvaṃ brūmahe yenaivamupālabhyemahi |
kiṃ tvagṛhītavivekasya jñānadvayasya prāptasamīcīnapuraḥsthitarajatajñā-
nasārūpyasyetyanuktopālambhoyamiti cet — tadapyayuktam | vikalpāsa-
hatvāt | tathā hi — samīcīnarajatāvabhāsasārūpyaṃ bhāsamānaṃ prava-
rtakaṃ sattāmātreṇa vā | ādye vikalpe bhedāgrahāparaparyāyasya sārū-
pyasya samīcīnasaṃnibhe ime jñāne iti viśeṣākāreṇa gṛhyamāṇasya
pravṛttikāraṇatvaṃ kiṃ vānayoreva svarūpato viṣayataśca mitho bhedā-
graho vidyata iti sāmānyākāreṇa gṛhyamāṇasya sārūpyasya | nādyaḥ |
samīcīnajñānavattatsaṃnibhajñānasya taducitavyavahārapravartakatvānupa-
patteḥ | na khalu gosaṃnibho gavaya ityavabhāso gavārthinaṃ gavaye prava-
rtayati | na dvitīyaḥ | vyāhatatvāt | na khalvanākalitabhedasyāna-
yoriti anayoriti grahe bhedāgraha iti ca pratipattirbhavati | ataḥ
pariśeṣātsattāmātreṇa bhedāgraharūpasya sārūpyasya vyavahārakāraṇatva-
maṅgīkartavyam | evamevāstviti cet — tarhīdamiha saṃpradhāryam — kimayaṃ
bhedāgrahaḥ samāropotpādanakrameṇa vyavahārakāraṇamastūtānutpāditā-
ropa eva svayamiti | na ca dvitīyaḥ pakṣa eva śreyān | tāvatai-
va vyavahārotpattāvāropasya gauravadoṣaduṣṭatvāditi mantavyam | viśi-
ṣṭavyavahārasya viśiṣṭajñānapūrvakatvaniyamenājñānapūrvakatvānupapatteḥ |

nanvayaṃ vyavahāro nājñānapūrvaka ityanākalitaparābhisaṃdhiḥ svasi-
ddhāntasiddhārthādyadi kaścicchaṅketa sa prativaktavyaḥ | śuktikāviṣa-
yasya grahaṇasyāsamīhitaviṣayatvena rajatārthipravṛttihetutvāsaṃbhavāda-
nvayavyatirekābhyāṃ rajatajñānasya samīhitaviṣayatvena pravṛttihetutvasaṃ-
bhavāccedamarthābhisaṃbhinnagrahaviviktasyāpi rajatasmaraṇasya kāraṇatvaṃ
vaktavyam | tacca vaktuṃ na śakyate | jānāti icchati tataḥ pravartata
iti nyāyena jñānecchāpravṛttīnāṃ samānaviṣayatvena bhāvyam | tathā
cedaṃkārāspadābhimukhapravṛttasya rajatārthinastadicchānibandhanam |
anyathānyadicchannanyadvyavaharatīti vyāhanyeta | tathā ca yadīdaṃkārā-
spadaṃ rajatāvabhāsagocaratāṃ nācaretkathaṃ rajatārthī tadicchet | yadya-
rajatatvāgrahaṇāditi brūyāt rajatatvāgrahātkasmādayaṃ nopekṣeteti |
yugapattadbhavabhedāgrahābhedāgrahanibandhanābhyāmupādānopekṣābhyāṃ purataḥ
pṛṣṭhataścākṛṣyamāṇaḥ puruṣo dolāyamānatayā rūpyāropamantareṇopā-
dānapakṣa eva na vyavasthāpyata ityanicchatāpyacchamatinā samāropaḥ
samāśrayaṇīyaḥ | yathāha — bhedāgrahādidaṃkārāspade rajatatvamāropya
tajjātīyasyopakārahetubhāvamanusmṛtya tajjātīyatvenāsyāpi tadanu-
māya tadarthī pravartata iti prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ praśasyaḥ |

na ca taṭastharajatasmaraṇapakṣepi hetorgṛhītatvenāyaṃ mārgaḥ samāna
iti vācyam | rajatatvasya hetoḥ pakṣadharmatvābhāvāt | na ca pakṣa-
dharmatāyā abhāvepi vyāptibalādgamakatvaṃ śaṅkyam | vyāptipakṣadharmatā-
valliṅgasyaiva gamakatvāṅgīkārāt | tadāhuḥ śabarasvāminaḥ — jñāta-
saṃbandhasyaiva puṃso liṅgaviśiṣṭadharmyekadeśadarśanālliṅgiviśiṣṭadharmyeka-
deśabuddhiranumānamiti | ācāryopyavocat —

sa eṣa cobhayātmā yo gamye gamaka iṣyate |
asiddhenaikadeśena gamyāsiddherna bodhakaḥ || iti |
nanu bhavatpakṣepi puraḥsthitasyedamarthasya paramārthato rajatatvaṃ nāstīti
na rajatatvaṃ dharmyekadeśa iti cenna | yakṣānurūpo baliriti nyāyenānu-
mityābhāsānuguṇasyaikadeśasya vidyamānatvāt | tathā ca prayogaḥ —
vivādādhyāsitaṃ rajatajñānaṃ purovartiviṣayaṃ rajatārthinastatra niya-
mena pravartakatvāt | yaduktasādhanaṃ taduktasādhyaṃ yathobhayavādisaṃmataṃ
satyarajatajñānam | vivādapadaṃ śuktiśakalaṃ rajatajñānaviṣayo'vyavadhā-
nena rajatārthipravṛttiviṣayatvādrajatapadasamānādhikaraṇapadāntaravā-
cyatvādvā vasturajatavat |

yaduktaṃ rajatajñānasya śuktikālambanatvenubhavavirodha iti tadapya-
yuktam | vikalpāsahatvāt | tathā hi — tatra kiṃ rajatākārapratītiṃ
prati śukterālambanatvenubhavavirodha udbhāvyata idamaṃśasya vā | nādyaḥ |
anaṅgīkāraparāhatatvāt | na dvitīyaḥ | idaṃtāniyatadeśādhikara-
ṇasya cākacakyaviśiṣṭasya vastuno rajatajñānālambanatvamanavalamba-
mānasya bhavata evānubhavavirodhāt | idaṃ rajatamiti sāmānādhi-
karaṇyena purovartinyaṅgulinirdeśapūrvakamupādānādivyavahāradarśanācca |

yaccoktam — doṣāṇāmautsargikakāryaprasavaśaktipratibandhakatayā vi-
parītakāritvaṃ nāstīti | tadapyayuktam | dāvadagdhavetrabījādau tathā
darśanāt | na ca dagdhasya vetrabījatvaṃ nāstīti mantavyam | śyāmasya
ghaṭasya raktatāmātreṇa ghaṭatvanivṛttiprasaṅgāt | nanu ghaṭoyaṃ ghaṭoya-
mityanuvṛttayoḥ pratyayaprayogayoḥ sadbhāvāddhaṭatvasya sadbhāva iti
cenna | atrāpīdaṃ vetrabījamiti tayoḥ samānatvāt | tathā bhasma-
kadoṣadūṣitasya jāṭharāgnerbahvannapacanasāmarthyaṃ dṛśyate | na ca bahva-
nnapacanasāmarthyaṃ jāṭharasyaiva jātavedaso na bhasmakavyādheriti vaktuṃ
yuktam | tasya mandamalpapacanasāmarthyepi sahasā mahatpacanasya bhasma-
kavyādhisāhāyakamantareṇānupapatteḥ | anyathā sarveṣāṃ tathāpatteḥ |
kiṃ ca jñānānāṃ yathārthavyavahārakāraṇatvepi doṣavaśādayathārthavyavahā-
rakāraṇatvamaṅgīkurvāṇo bhavāneva paryanuyojyo bhavati | taduktaṃ
bhāṣye — yaścobhayoḥ samāno doṣo dyotate tatra kaścodyo bhavatīti |
atrāpyuktam —

yaścobhayoḥ samo doṣaḥ parihāropi vā samaḥ |
naikaḥ paryanuyoktavyastādṛgarthavicāraṇe || iti |
tathāpi māmakasyānumānasya kiṃ dūṣaṇaṃ dattamāsīt | yadyanumānadū-
ṣaṇaṃ vinā na parituṣyati hanta kālātyayāpadiṣṭatā | kṛṣṇavartmānu-
ṣṇatvānumānavat | etāvantaṃ kālaṃ yadidaṃ rajatamityabhādasau śukti-
riti pratyakṣeṇa prācīnapratyayasyāyathārthatvaṃ pravedayatā yathārthatvānu-
mānasyāpahṛtaviṣayatvādbādhyatvasaṃbhavāt |

yaccoktaṃ svagocaravyabhicāre sarvānāśvāsaprasaṅga iti | tadasāṃ-
pratam | saṃvidāṃ kvacitsaṃvādivyavahārajanakatvepi na sarvatra taccha-
ṅkayā pravṛttyuccheda iti yathā tāvake mate tathā māmakepyasau panthā
na vārita iti samānayogakṣematvāt | tautātitamatamavalambya
vidhivivekaṃ vyākurvāṇairācāryavācaspatimiśrairbodhakatvena svataḥ prā-
māṇyaṃ nāvyabhicāreṇeti nyāyakaṇikāyāṃ pratyapādi | tasmādaviśvā-
saśaṅkānavakāśaṃ labhate |

nanu mādhyamikamatāvalambanena rajatādivibhramālambanamasaditi
cet — taduktam | asato'parokṣapratibhāsāyogyatvāt | tadupāditsayā
pravṛttyanupapatteśca | nanu vijñānameva vāsanādisvakāraṇasāmarthyā-
sāditadṛṣṭāntasiddhasvabhāvaviśeṣamasatprakāśanasamarthanamupajātam |
asatprakāśanaśaktiravidyā saṃvṛtiriti paryāyāḥ | tasmādavidyāvaśā-
dasanto bhāntīti cet — tadapi vaktumaśakyam | śakyasya durnirū-
pyatvāt | kimatra śakyaṃ kāryaṃ jñāpyaṃ vā | nādyaḥ | asataḥ kāraṇa-
tvānupapatteḥ | na dvitīyaḥ | śakyasya kāraṇatvenāṅgīkṛtatvāt |
jñānādanyasya jñānasyānupalabdheśca | upalabdhau vā tasyāpi jñāpya-
tvena jñāpakāntarāpekṣāyāmanavasthāpatteśca | athaitaddoṣaparijihīrṣayā
vijñānaṃ sadrūpamevāsataḥ prakāśakamiti kakṣīkriyata iti cet —
atra devānāṃpriyaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ punaḥ | asau sadasatoḥ saṃbandho nirū-
pyanirūpakabhāvo'vinābhāvo vā | nādyaḥ | asata upakārādhā-
ratvāyogenānupakṛtatayā nirūpyatvānupapatteḥ | na caramaḥ | dhūma-
dhūmadhvajayoriva tadutpattilakṣaṇasya śiṃśapāvṛkṣayoriva tādātmya-
lakṣaṇasya vā avinābhāvanidānasya sadasatorasaṃbhavāt | tasmādvi-
jñānamevāsatprakāśakamityasadvādināmayamasatpralāpa ityāropyamāṇaṃ
nāsat |

nanu vijñānavādinayānusāreṇa pratīyamānaṃ rajataṃ jñānātmakam |
tatra ca yuktirabhidhīyate — yadyathānubhūyate tattathā | anyathātvaṃ tu
balavadbādhakopanipātādāsthīyata ityubhayavādisaṃmatorthaḥ | tatra ca
nedaṃ rajatamiti niṣiddhedaṃbhāvaṃ rajatamarthādāntarajñānarūpamavatiṣṭhate |
na cedaṃtayā niṣedhe satyanidaṃtayā ca bahirapi vyavasthopapatteḥ kutaḥ
saṃvidākārateti vācyam | vyavahitasyāparokṣatvānupapattāvaparo-
kṣasya vijñānasya kakṣīkartavyatvāt | tathā ca prayogaḥ — vivādapadaṃ
vijñānākāraḥ saṃprayogamantareṇāparokṣatvādvijñānavaditi | tadanupapa-
nnam | vikalpāsahatvāt | bādhakovabodhaḥ kiṃ sākṣājjñānākāratāṃ
bodhayatyarthādvā | nādyaḥ | nedaṃ rajatamiti pratyayasya rajatavivekamā-
tragocarasya jñānābhedagocaratāyāmanubhavavirodhāt | nedaṃ rajatamiti
rajatasya purovartitvapratiṣedho jñānākāratāṃ kalpayatīti cet — tade-
tadvārtam | prasaktapratiṣedhātmano bādhakāvabodhasya tatraiva sattvātprati-
ṣedhopapatteḥ | vijñānākāratvasādhanamaṣyavijñānākāre bahiṣṭhe sākṣi-
pratyakṣe bhāvarūpājñāne vartata iti savyabhicāraḥ |

nanvanyathākhyātivādimatānusāreṇa rajatasya deśāntarasattvena
bhāvyam | anyathā tasya pratiṣedhapratiyogitvānupapatteḥ | na hi
kaścitprekṣāvāñśaśaviṣāṇaṃ pratiṣeddhuṃ prabhavati | taduktam —

vyāvartyābhāvavattaiva bhāvikī hi viśeṣyatā |
abhāvavirahātmatvaṃ vastunaḥ pratiyogitā || (nyā. ku. 3 | 2) iti |
tathā ca tasya deśāntarasattvamāśrayaṇīyamiti cet — tadapi na
pramāṇapaddhatimadhyāste | asataḥ saṃsargasyeva kaladhautasya niṣedhaprati-
yogitvopapatteḥ |

nanvidaṃ rajatamiti jñānamekamanekaṃ vā | na tāvadādyaḥ | apasi-
ddhāntāpatterasaṃbhavācca | tathā hi | śuktīdamaṃśendriyasaṃprayogādida-
mākārāntaḥpariṇāmarūpamekaṃ jñānaṃ jāyate | na ca tatra kaladhautaṃ
viṣayabhāvamākalpayitumutsahate | asaṃprayuktatvāttasya | viṣayatvā-
ṅgīkāre sarvajñātvāpatteḥ | na ca cakṣuranvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitayā
tajjñānasya tajjanyatvaṃ vācyam | idamaṃśajñānotpattau tadupakṣayopa-
patteḥ | na cāpi saṃskārādrajatajñānasya janma | smṛtitvāpatteḥ | athe-
ndriyadoṣasya tatkaraṇatvam | tadapyayuktam | svātantryeṇa tasya jñāna-
hetutvānupapatteḥ | na hi grahaṇasmaraṇābhyāmanyaḥ prakāraḥ samasti |
tasmādidamaṃśarajatatādātmyaviṣayamekaṃ vijñānaṃ na ghaṭate | nāpyane-
kamakhyātimatāpatteriti cet —

ucyate | prathamaṃ doṣakaluṣitena cakṣuṣedaṃtāmātraviṣayāntaḥkara-
ṇavṛttirutpadyate | anantaraṃ tayā vṛttyā caitanyāvaraṇābhibhave sati
taccaitanyamabhivyajyate | paścādidamaṃśacaitanyaniṣṭhā avidyā rāgādido-
ṣakaluṣitā kaladhautākāreṇa pariṇamate | idamākārāntaḥkaraṇapari-
ṇāmāvacchinnacaitanyaniṣṭhā kaladhautagocarapariṇāmasaṃskārasacivā
kaladhautajñānābhāsākāreṇa pariṇamate | tau ca rajatavṛttipariṇāmau
svādhiṣṭhānena sākṣicaitanyenāvyavadhānena bhāsyete | tathā ca savṛtti-
kāyā avidyāyāḥ sākṣibhāsyatvābhyupagame vṛttyantaravedyatvābhāvā-
nnānavasthā | yadyapyantaḥkaraṇavṛttiravidyāvṛttiśceti dve ime jñāne
tathāpi viṣayādhīnaṃ phalam | jñāto ghaṭa iti viṣayāvacchinnatayā
phalapratīteḥ | tadviṣayaśca satyamithyābhūtayoridamaṃśarajatāṃśayoranyo-
nyātmakatayaikatvamāpannaḥ | tasmādviṣayāvacchinnaphalasyāpyekatvā-
jjñānaikyamupacaryate | taduktam —

satyamithyātmanoraikyādekastadviṣayo mataḥ |
tadāyattaphalaikatvājjñānaikyamupacaryate || iti |
pañcapādikāyāmapi phalaikyājjñānaikyamupacaryata ityabhiprāyeṇa sā
caikameva jñānamekaphalaṃ janayati (pa. pā. pṛ. 9 pa. 15) ityuktam |

nanu śuktikāmastake bhāvyamānasya kaladhautasya tatraiva satyatvā-
bhyupagame nedaṃ rajatamiti niṣedhaḥ kathaṃ prabhavediti cenna | prātibhā-
sikasatyatvepi vyāvahārikasatyatvābhāvena pratipannopādhau prati-
yogitvasaṃbhavāt | taduktaṃ pañcapādikāvivaraṇe (pṛ. 31 pa. 1) —
trividhaṃ sattvam | paramārthasattvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ | arthakriyāsāmarthyaṃ sattvaṃ
māyopādhikamākāśādeḥ | avidyopādhikaṃ sattvaṃ rajatāderiti |
anyatrāpyuktam —

tāttvikaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sattvaṃ vyomādervyāvahārikam |
rūpyāderarthajātasya prātibhāsikamiṣyate || iti |

vaidikena pramāṇena yadbādhyaṃ vaidikevadhau |
tadvyāvahārikaṃ sattvaṃ bādhyaṃ mātrā sahaiva tat || iti ca |
tataḥ khyātibādhānyathānupapattyā bhrāntigocarasya māyāmayasya raja-
tādeḥ sadasadvilakṣaṇatvalakṣaṇamanirvacanīyatvaṃ siddham | tamavocacci-
tsukhācāryaḥ —

pratyekaṃ sadasattvābhyāṃ vicārapadavīṃ na yat |
gāhate tadanirvācyamāhurvedāntavādinaḥ || (citsu. pṛ. 79) iti |

nanu māyāvidyayoḥ svāśrayavyāmohahetutvatadabhāvābhyāṃ bhedasya
jāgarūkatvenāvidyāmayatve vaktavye māyāmayatvoktirāropyasyāyu-
kteti cet — tadayuktam | anirvacanīyatvatattvābhāsapratibandhakatvādi-
lakṣaṇajātasya māyāvidyayoḥ samānatvāt | kiṃ cāśrayaśabdena draṣṭo-
cyate kartā vā | nādyaḥ | mantrauṣadhādinimittamāyādarśinastasya
vyāmohadarśanāt | na dvitīyaḥ | viṣṇoḥ svāśritamāyayaiva rāmāvatāre
mohitatvena tatra māyāvitvasyāprayojakatvāt | bādhaniścayamantrā-
dipratīkārabodhayoreva prayojakatvāt | aparathā paṅgvandhavatkartāpi
vyāmuhyeta | na cecchānuvidhānānanuvidhānābhyāṃ tayorbheda iti bhaṇi-
tavyam | māyāsthale maṇimantrauṣadhādiprayogavadavidyāsthalepi dvica-
ndrakeśoṇḍrakādivibhramanimittāṅgulyavaṣṭambhādāvapi svātantryopala-
mbhāt | ata eva tatra tatra śrutismṛtibhāṣyādiṣu māyāvidyayora-
bhedena vyavahāraḥ saṃgacchate | kvacidvikṣepaprādhānyenāvaraṇaprādhānyena
ca māyāvidyayorbhede tadvyavahāro na virudhyate | taduktam —

māyā vikṣipadajñānamīśecchāvaśavarti vā |
avidyācchādayattattvaṃ svātantryānuvidhāyi vā || iti |

nanvavidyāsadbhāve kiṃ pramāṇam | ahamajño māmanyaṃ ca na jānāmīti
pratyakṣapratibhāsa eva | nanu jñānābhāvaviṣayoyaṃ nābhipretamarthaṃ gamaya-
tīti cet — na tāvadanupalabdhivādinaścodyametat | parokṣapratibhā-
sahetutvāttasyāḥ | ayamapi parokṣapratibhāsa eveti cet — na tāva-
lliṅgaśabdānupapadyamānārthajanyaḥ | jñātakaraṇatvātteṣām | na caitatsā-
magrīkāle jñānamasti | anubhūyate vā | anupalabdhyā janyata iti
cet — na tāvadiyamajñātā karaṇam | pratyakṣetarasya jñātakaraṇatva-
niyamāt | nāpi jñātaiva karaṇam | anupalabdhyanavasthānāt | na ca
yathā pareṣāmabhāvagrahaṇe yogyānupalabdhiḥ sahakāriṇī tathā naḥ
karaṇamiti śaṅkyam | jñānakaraṇa iva sahakāriṇi jñātatvaniyamā-
bhāvāt | astu vā tathā jñeyābhāvagrahaṇe karaṇam | jñānābhāvagrahaṇe
karaṇaṃ na bhavatyeveti vakṣyate |

pratyakṣābhāvavāde tu pratyakṣeṇa tāvaddharmipratiyogijñānayoḥ sato-
rātmani jñānamātrābhāvagrahaṇaṃ na brūyāt | ghaṭavati bhūtale ghaṭābhā-
vasyeva jñānamātrābhāvasya grahītumaśakyatvāt | tayorasatostu suta-
rām | kāraṇābhāvāt | atopi yogyānupalabdhyā vā phalaliṅgādya-
bhāvena vātmani jñānamātrābhāvagrahaṇaṃ durlabhamiti paramatepyayaṃ nyāyaḥ
samānaḥ | tadevamātmani pratyakṣeṇa vānyena vā jñānamātrābhāvasya
grahaṇamaśakyamiti sthitam |

nanu jñānaviśeṣābhāvaḥ pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyatām | na tāvatsmaraṇā-
bhāvaḥ | abhāvagrahaṇe pratiyogismaraṇasya kāraṇatvāt | nāpyanubha-
vābhāvaḥ | tasyāvarjanīyatvāt | nanvātmani ghaṭānubhavābhāvaḥ pratya-
kṣaviṣayastarhyahamajña iti jñānasāmānyavacano jānātirjñānaviśeṣenubhave
lakṣaṇayā vartanīyaḥ | lakṣaṇā ca saṃbandhenupapattau ca satyāṃ vartate |
saṃbandhastāvadanubhavatvajñānatvayorekavyaktisamāveśo vyāpyavyāpaka-
bhāvo vā vidyata eva | anupapattiṃ tu na paśyāmaḥ | nanvanubhavābhāve
pratyakṣasya prameyalā bhastenaiva tasyārthavattā sidhyati | satyam | prayojana-
metannānupapattiḥ | anyonyāśrayāt | nanvahamajña ityatra nañ ātmani
jñānamātrābhāvaṃ na brūte | jñānavati tasmiṃstadabhāvāt | nāpyanubhavā-
bhāvam | jñānoktestadanabhidhāyakatvāt | nairarthakyaṃ ca na yuktamitya-
nayaivānupapattyā lakṣaṇeti cet — uktalakṣaṇaivāvidyā tadarthostu |
saṃdeha iti cenna | asamatvātkoṭidvayasya | anyatra hi pratiyogi-
nivṛttirnañarthaḥ | atra tu pratiyogivyāpyanivṛttiriti | jānāti-
samabhivyāhṛtasya nañaḥ kvaciduktalakṣaṇāvidyāviṣayatvasiddhimantareṇa
na saṃdeha ityavaśyaṃbhāvena saiva jānātisamabhivyāhṛtasya nañaḥ sarvatra
tadviṣayatvamavagamayati vilumpati jñānābhāvakoṭyantaramiti kva
saṃdehāvakāśaḥ | tadevaṃ lakṣaṇāhetvabhāvenubhavābhāvopyātmani na
pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyata iti pariśeṣāduktalakṣaṇāvidyaivājñā iti pratibhā-
sasya viṣaya iti sthitam |

astu vā jñānābhāvapratibhāsaḥ | ayamabhāvaśca pratiyogī yatra
niṣidhyate na tatastattvāntaramanyadadhikaraṇabhāvāt | mā bhūdanyabhā-
vatvamanyābhāvatvaṃ tu syāt | nanu tadapi viruddham | satyaṃ sati bhede |
sa ca pramāṇāt | tacca sati pratiyogyabhāvādhikaraṇatastattvāntare |
nanu ghaṭavati bhūtale ghaṭābhāvamitivyavahṛtī syātāmiti cet — mā
bhūtāmete pratiyoginā sahānubhūyamānedhikaraṇe | pratiyogismaraṇe
satyanubhūyamānedhikaraṇe tu syātām | evamapyupapattau na tattvānta-
raviṣayatvaṃ kalpyam | kānupapattiriti cedbādhakābhāvastāvadukta
eva | bādhakaṃ tu kalpanāgauravameva | tathā hi — tattvāntaratvaṃ tāva-
dekaṃ kalpyam | tasyāparokṣatvāyendriyasaṃnikarṣaḥ kalpyaḥ | sa ca
saṃyogādirna bhavatīti saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇatvādiḥ kalpya ityato vara-
muktalakṣaṇasyādhikaraṇasya vyavahāraviṣayeṅgīkāraḥ | sati caivaṃ
jñānābhāvenāpi pratiyogismṛtau satyāmanubhūyamānamadhikaraṇaṃ jñātai-
va | sa ca na kevalamantaḥkaraṇam | jaḍatvāt | nāpi kevala
ātmaiva | apariṇāmitvādaguṇatvācca | ata ubhayorabhedādhyāsaḥ |
ātmādhyāsaścoktalakṣaṇāvidyātmetyāyātamavidyāyāmevāhamajña iti
pratibhāsaḥ pramāṇamiti |

anumānaṃ ca — vivādapadaṃ pramāṇajñānaṃ svaprāgabhāvavyatiriktasvavi-
ṣayāvaraṇasvanivartyasvadeśagatavastvantarapūrvakamaprakāśitārthaprakāśaka-
tvāt | andhakāre prathamotpannapradīpaprabhāvaditi | vastupūrvakamityukta
ātmavastupūrvakatvenārthāntaratā | tadarthaṃ vastvantareti | tathāpi viṣa-
yabhūte vastvantarerthāntaratā | tadarthaṃ svadeśagateti | adṛṣṭādikaṃ pratyā-
deṣṭuṃ svanivartyeti | uttarajñānanivartyaṃ prathamajñānaṃ nivartayituṃ svaviṣa-
yāvaraṇeti | prāgabhāvaṃ pratikṣeptuṃ svaprāgabhāvavyatirikteti | svaprā-
gabhāvavyatiriktapūrvakamityukte viṣayeṇārthāntaratā | tadarthaṃ viṣayā-
varaṇeti | tādṛśamandhakāraṃ vyāseddhuṃ svanivartyeti | viṣayagatāma-
jñātatāṃ nirākartuṃ svadeśagateti | mithyājñānamapohituṃ vastvanta-
reti | dhārāvāhikavijñāne vyabhicāraṃ vyāseddhumaprakāśiteti |
madhyavartipradīpaprabhāyāṃ sādhyasādhanavaidhuryapratirodhāya prathamotpanna-
viśeṣaṇam | saurālokavyāptadeśasthapradīpaprabhāpratikṣepāyāndhakā-
reti | na ca jñānasādhake pramāṇe vyabhicāraḥ śaṅkanīyaḥ | vipratipannaṃ
pratyasattvanivṛttimātrasya pramāṇakṛtyatvāt | taduktaṃ devatādhikaraṇe
kalpatarukārairanumānādibhirasattvanivṛttiḥ kriyata iti | nanu sādha-
navikalo dṛṣṭānta iti cenna | prakāśaśabdena tamovirodhyākārasya
vivakṣitatvāt | taduktaṃ vivaraṇavivaraṇe sahajasarvajñaviṣṇubhaṭṭopā-
dhyāyaiḥ — na cātra pakṣadṛṣṭāntayorekaprakāśarūpānanvayaḥ śaṅkanīyaḥ |
tamovirodhyākāro hi prakāśaśabdavācyaḥ | tenākāreṇaikyamubhaya-
trāstīti | narendragiriśrīcaraṇaistvitthamuktam — aprakāśitaprakāśavya-
vahārahetutvaṃ hetvarthaḥ | tasya cobhayatrānugatatvānnāsiddhyādiriti |
śruteśca | bhūyaścānte viśvamāyānivṛttiḥ (śve. 1 | 10) ityādikā śrutiḥ |

taratyavidyāṃ vitatāṃ hṛdi yasminniveśite |
yogī māyāmameyāya tasmai vidyātmane namaḥ || iti ca |
etenaitatpratyuktaṃ yaduktaṃ bhāskareṇa kṣapaṇakacaraṇaṃ pramāṇaśaraṇe bhedā-
bhedavādināṃ bhāvarūpamajñānaṃ nāsti kiṃ tu jñānābhāva iti | tathā ca
bhāskarapraṇītaśārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣyagranthaḥ | yadeva pararūpādarśanaṃ
saivāvidyeti | bhāvarūpājñānānabhyupagame jīveśvarādivibhāgānupa-
patteḥ | na ca bhāvikaḥ paramātmanoṃśo jīva iti vācyam |

niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śāntaṃ niravadyaṃ nirañjanam | (śve. 6 | 19)
ityādiśrutivirodhāt |

kecana śāktāḥ — śaktiṃ māyāśabdārthabhūtāṃ jagatkāraṇatvenāṅgī-
kṛtāṃ satyāmabhyupetya mātuliṅgagadākheṭavidhāriṇī mahālakṣmīstasyāḥ
prathamāvatāra iti varṇayanti | sā ca kālarātriḥ sarasvatīti dve
śaktī utpādya brahmāṇaṃ puruṣaṃ śriyaṃ ca striyamutpādayāmāsa | svayaṃ
mithunaṃ janayitvā svasute apyāha — ahamiva yuvāmapi mithunamutpā-
dayatamiti | tataḥ kālarātrirmahādevaṃ puruṣaṃ svarāṃ striyaṃ ca janayā-
māsa | sarasvatī ca viṣṇuṃ puruṣaṃ gaurīṃ ca śriyamudapādayat | tata-
ścādirvivāhamakarodakārayacca | evaṃ brahmaṇe svarāṃ viṣṇave śriyaṃ
śivāya gaurīṃ dattvā śaktiyuktānāṃ teṣāṃ sṛṣṭisthitisaṃhārākhyāni
karmāṇi pratyapādayaditi | tadetanmataṃ śrutyādimūlapramāṇavidhuratayā
svotprekṣāmātraparikalpitamiti svarūpavyākriyaiva nirākriyetyupe-
kṣaṇīyam | tataścānirvacanīyānādyavidyālasitaḥ pratyagātmani pratī-
yamānaḥ pramātṛtvādiprapañca ityalamatiprasaṅgena |

nanu kimarthaṃ pramātṛtvādīnāmāvidyakatvaṃ nigadyate | brahmajñānena
nivartanāya jīvasya brahmabhāvāya vā | na prathamaḥ | śāstraprāmāṇyādeva
satyasyāpi jñānena nivṛtterupapatteḥ | upalambhācca | tathā hi —

setuṃ dṛṣṭvā vimucyeta brahmahā brahmahatyayā |
ityādinā pāpaṃ sanīsrasyate | viṣayadoṣadarśanena rāgo daṃdahyate |
tārkṣyadhyānena viṣaṃ śamyate | evaṃ kartṛtvādibandhaḥ pāramārthikopi
tattvajñānena nivartyeta | na caramaḥ | aupādhikasya jīvabhāvasyopādhi-
nivṛttyā nivṛttau brahmabhāvasaṃbhavāt | tasmādbandhasyāvidyakatvavāco-
yuktiḥ sāvadyeti cet — naitadanavadyam | satyasyātmavajjñānanivartyatvā-
nupapatteḥ | bandhasya mithyātvamantareṇa śāstraprāmāṇyādapi tadasi-
ddheśca | śāstramapi

lokāvagatasāmarthyaḥ śabdo vedepi bodhakaḥ |
iti nyāyena lokāvalokitāṃ padaśaktiṃ padārthayogyatāṃ corarīkṛtya
pracaratīti | aparathā ādityo yūpaḥ (tai. brā. 2 | 1 | 5) yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ
(tai. saṃ. 1 | 7 | 4) ityādivākyastomasya yathāśruterthe prāmāṇyāpatteḥ |
vaidikyāḥ kriyāyāḥ samakṣakṣayitayā pāratrikaphalakaraṇatvānyathā-
nupapattyā apūrvāṅgīkaraṇānupapattiśca | loke ca śuktivyaktitattvābhi-
vyaktāvapanīyamānasyāropitasya mithyātvadṛṣṭau taddṛṣṭāntāvaṣṭambhenā-
tmatattvasākṣātkāravidyāpanodyasyāvidyakasya bandhasya mithyātvānu-
mānasaṃbhavāt | vimataṃ mithyā adhiṣṭhānatattvajñānanivartyatvācchukti-
kārūpyavaditi | na ca vimataṃ satyaṃ bhāsamānatvāditi pratiprayoge
samānabalatayā bādhapratirodhaḥ | pratirodhabhiyānyataradoṣatvasaṃbha-
vāditi vaditavyam | marumarīcikodakādau savyabhicārāt | abā-
dhitatvena viśeṣaṇānna doṣa iti cet — maivaṃ bhāṣiṣṭhāḥ | viśeṣaṇā-
siddheḥ | tatredaṃ bhavānpṛṣṭo vyācaṣṭām | katipayapuruṣakatipayakālā-
bādhitatvaṃ hetuviśeṣaṇaṃ kriyate sarvathā bādhavaidhuryaṃ vā | na prathamaḥ |

yatnenānumitopyarthaḥ kuśalairanumātṛbhiḥ |
abhiyuktatarairanyairanyathaivopapādyate || (vākyapa. 1 | 34)
iti nyāyena tricaturapratipattṛpratipāditasyāpi pratipattrantareṇa prakā-
rāntaramurarīkṛtya pratipādanāt | nāpi caramaḥ | sarvathā bādhavaidhurya-
syāsarvajñadurjñeyatvāt | yadyevaṃ hanta tarhi jñānātmanopi satyatvaṃ nāvaga-
myata iti cet — maivaṃ maṃsthāḥ | tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā (chā. 6 | 8 | 7)
ityāgamasaṃvādagateḥ | na ca prapañcepyayaṃ nyāya iti mantavyam | tādṛ-
śasyāgamasyānupalambhāt | pratyutādvitīyatvaṃ śrāvayantyāḥ śruteḥ
prapañcamithyātva eva pakṣapātāt | nanu kalpanāmātraśarīrasya pakṣasa-
pakṣavipakṣādeḥ sarvasulabhatvena jayaparājayavyavasthayā kathaṃ kathā
pratheta | kātra kathaṃtā |

evaṃ tricaturajñānajanmano nādhikā matiḥ | (ślo. vā. 1 | 1 | 2 sūtre)
iti nyāyena tricaturakakṣyāviśrāntasya tattadābhāsalakṣaṇānāliṅgi-
tasya dūṣaṇabhūṣaṇādestatra kathāṅgatvāṅgīkārāt | ata evoktaṃ khaṇḍa-
nakāreṇa — vyāvahārikīṃ pramāṇasattāmādāya vicārārambhaḥ (kha.
pṛ. 44) iti | na ca bhedagrāhibhiḥ pramāṇairadvaitaśruterjaghanyateti
śaṅkyam | brahmaṇi pāramārthikasatyatvena tadāvedikāyāstattvāvedanala-
kṣaṇaprāmāṇyāyāḥ śrutervyāvahārikapramāṇabhāvānāṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ ca
vibhinnaviṣayatayā parasparaṃ bādhyabādhakabhāvāsaṃbhavāt | tadapyuktaṃ
tenaiva —

tadadvaitaśrutestāvadbādhaḥ pratyakṣataḥ kṣataḥ |
nānumānādi taṃ kartuṃ tavāpi kṣamate mate || (kha. 1 | 20)

dhīdhanā bādhanāyāsyāstadā prajñāṃ prayacchatha |
kṣeptuṃ cintāmaṇiṃ pāṇilabdhamabdhau yadīcchatha || (kha. 1 | 24)
tasmāttattvajñānena nivartanāyāsya bandhasyājñānakalpitatvamaṅgīkarta-
vyam | yata uktaṃ yato jñānamajñānasya nivartakamiti |

yaduktaṃ satyasyāpi duritasya setudarśanena nivṛttirupalabhyata iti |
tadayuktam | vihitakriyānuṣṭhānena janitasya dharmasyādharmanivartakatva-
dhrauvyāt | dharmeṇa pāpamapanudanti (ma. nā. 22 | 1) iti śruteḥ | pramā-
ṇavastuparatantraśālinyā darśanakriyāyāścoditapuruṣaprayatnatantratvābhā-
vena vidhānāsaṃbhavāt |

brahmahatyāṃ pramucyeta tasminsnātvā mahodadhau |
ityādismṛtivihitabrahmacaryāṅgasahitadūrataradeśagamanasādhyabrahmahanana-
nivṛttiphalakasetusnānapraśaṃsārthatvāt | yasya hi darśanamātreṇaiva
duritopaśamaḥ kimuta snānena | anyathā dūragamanānarthakyaṃ prasajet |
tatra kharādīnāmapyanarthanivṛttirāpatet | andhasya na syācca | nanu —

agnicitkapilā rājā satī bhikṣurmahodadhiḥ |
dṛṣṭamātrāḥ punantyete tasmātpaśyeta nityaśaḥ ||
iti kvaciddarśanakriyāyā api vidhānaṃ darīdṛśyata iti cet — maivaṃ
vocaḥ | tatrāpyanayaivānupapattyāgnicidādyarghaparicaryādāveva tātparyā-
vadhāraṇāt | yaccoktaṃ viṣayadoṣadarśanādrāgo dandahyata iti | tatra
viṣayadoṣadarśanena virodhabhūtānabhiratisaṃjñakavairāgyaikaprādurbhāvādrā-
ganivṛttau tadadarśanamātramiti na vyabhicāraḥ | yadapi tārkṣyadhyā-
nādinā viṣādi satyaṃ vinaśyatīti | tanna śliṣyate | tatrāpi mantra-
prayogādikriyāyā eva viṣādyapanodakatvāt | dhyānasya pramātvā-
bhāvācca | yadavādyaupādhikasya jīvabhāvasyopādhinivṛttyā nivṛttau
brahmabhāvopapatterna tadarthamarthavaitathyakathanamiti | tadapi kāśakuśāva-
lambanakalpam | vikalpāsahatvāt | kimupādheḥ satyatvamabhipretya
mithyātvaṃ vā | na prathamaḥ | pramāṇābhāvāt | nāparaḥ | iṣṭāpatteḥ |
tasmādāvidyako bheda iti śrutāvadvitīyatvopapattayebhidhīyate na tu
vyasanitayā |

yadi vastutaḥ sarvopadravarahitamātmatattvaṃ tarhi kathaṃkāraṃ dehādi-
rūpaṃ kārāgāraṃ kāraṃkāraṃ punaḥpunastatra praviśati | tadatiphalgu |
avidyāyā anāditvena dattottaratvāt | ato nivṛttyupāya evānve-
ṣaṇīyaḥ prekṣāvatā | na tu vismayaḥ kartavyaḥ | tataśca tattvamasyādivi-
dyayā tadavidyānivṛttau niratiśayānandātmalābharūpaparamapuruṣārthaḥ
setsyati | tathā cāpastambasmṛtiḥ — ātmalābhānna paraṃ vidyata iti |
nanvasau nityalabdhaḥ | na hi svayameva svasyālabdho bhavati | satyam |
kiṃ tvanādimāyāsaṃbandhātkṣīrodakavatsamudācāravṛttitāṃ na labhate |
tathā ca yathā śabarādibhirbālyātsvasutaiḥ saha vardhito rājaputrasta-
jjātīyamātmānamavagacchanbandhubhirya evaṃbhūto rājā sa tvamasīti
bodhite svarūpe labdhasvarūpa iva bhavati tathā veśyāsthānīyayānādya-
vidyayā svabhāvāntaraṃ nīta ātmā mātṛsthānīyayā tattvamasītyā-
dikayā śrutyā svabhāvaṃ nīyate | etadāhustraividyavṛddhāḥ —

lg.l: nīcānāṃ vasatau tadīyatanayaiḥ sārdhaṃ ciraṃ vardhita-

div.p:
dātā bhogaparaḥ samagravibhavo yaḥ śāsitā duṣkṛtām
rājā sa tvamasīti rakṣitṛmukhācchrutvā yathāvatsa tu |
rājībhūya jayārthameva yatate tadvatpumānbodhitaḥ
śrutyā tattvamasītyapāsya duritaṃ brahmaiva saṃpadyate ||
etenaitatpratyuktaṃ yaduktaṃ paraiḥ kiṃ dvayostādātmyamekasya vā | nādyaḥ |
advaitabhaṅgaprasaṅgāt | na dvitīyaḥ | asaṃbhavāditi | tanna | avidyā-
parikalpitabhedanivṛttiparatvena tattvamasyāditādātmyavādaprāmāṇyo-
papatteḥ | tau ca paryanuyogaparihārāvagrāhiṣātāṃ manīṣibhiḥ |

na dvayorasti tādātmyaṃ na caikasyādvayatvataḥ |
aprāmāṇyaṃ śruterevaṃ nāropadhvaṃsamātrataḥ || iti |
tataśca tattvamasīti tattvaṃpadārthaśravaṇamananabhāvanābalabhuvā sākṣā-
tkāreṇānādyavidyānivṛttau saccidānandaikarasabrahmāvirbhāvaḥ saṃpatsyata
iti brahmaṇo jijñāsyatvaṃ prathamasūtroktaṃ yuktam |

ajñātaṃ viṣayo brahma jñātaṃ tacca prayojanam |
mumukṣuradhikārī syātsaṃbandhaḥ śaktitaḥ śruteḥ || iti |

janmādyasya yataḥ (bra. sū. 1 | 1 | 2) iti dvitīyasūtre brahma svarūpa-
lakṣaṇataṭasthalakṣaṇābhyāṃ nyarūpi | tatra svarūpāntargatatve sati
vyāvartakaṃ svarūpalakṣaṇaṃ satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma (tai. 2 | 1 | 1) ityā-
divedāntaiḥ pratipāditam | tasya satyajñānādyātmakasvarūpāntargatatve
sati vyāvartakatvāt | taṭasthalakṣaṇaṃ yato vā imāni (tai. 2 | 1)
ityādīni vākyāni nirūpayanti jagajjanmādikāraṇatvena | taduktaṃ
vivaraṇe —

jagajjanmasthitidhvaṃsā yataḥ sidhyanti kāraṇāt |
tatsvarūpataṭasthābhyāṃ lakṣaṇābhyāṃ pradarśyate || iti |

śāstrayonitvāt (bra. sū. 1 | 1 | 3) iti tṛtīyasūtre prathamavarṇakena
ṣaṣṭhīsamāsamāśritya sarvajñatvaṃ pratyapādi | dvitīyavarṇakena bahuvrīhi-
samāsamabhyupagamya brahmaṇo vedāntapramāṇakatvaṃ pratyajñāyi |

tattu samanvayāt (bra. sū. 1 | 1 | 4) iti caturthe sūtre prathamavarṇakena
vedāntānāṃ brahmaṇi tātparyaṃ pratyapādi | dvitīyavarṇakena vedāntānāṃ
pratipattividhiśeṣatayā brahmapratipādakatvaṃ pratyakṣepi | diṅmātramatra
pradarśitam | śiṣṭaṃ śāstra eva spaṣṭamiti sakalaṃ samañjasam ||
|| śrīrastu ||
div.trailer:
iti śrīmatsāyaṇamādhavīye sarvadarśanasaṃgrahe sakaladarśanaśiro-
laṃkāraratnaṃ śrīmacchāṃkaradarśanaṃ samāptam ||
